text: Sonic X Shadow Generations is a 3D platform game in the Sonic the Hedgehog video game franchise and a re-release of Sonic Generations (2011). The game is developed by Sonic Team and published by Sega, the same as many previous Sonic titles. The game prominently features Shadow the Hedgehog in his own new side- story. ==Gameplay== The Sonic Generations mode in this game is exactly the same as the original. The new side-mode Shadow Generations, however, makes several changes; Shadow has a completely new set of levels to go through from various Sonic titles released before and after the original, as well as a DLC pack with a level set in Tokyo based on the movie Sonic the Hedgehog 3. Shadow Generations includes a hub-world, which works the same way as the open-word gameplay from Sonic Frontiers.
